title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ奇譚 ジャック・ザ・リッパーの事件簿

altTitles.en: The Jack the Ripper Case Files
Record of Ragnarok: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

altTitles.ru: Повесть о Конце Света: Досье Джека-потрошителя

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Curious Tale: The Jack the Ripper Case Files

description.en:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
description.ja: 『終末のワルキューレ』第4回戦人類代表ジャック・ザ・リッパー。霧の都ロンドンを、恐怖のどん底に落とし、人類が応援することさえ躊躇した狂喜の殺人紳士に隠された真実とは？

altTitles.ja: そんな家族なら捨てちゃえば?

altTitles.vi: Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không?

altTitles.en: Is A Family Like This Worth Keeping?
If It's A Family Like That, Why Don't You Throw It Away?

description.en: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?
description.vi:
Bị vợ và con gái lạnh nhạt, Shinoya Reitaro buộc phải sinh hoạt trong cô độc ngay trong chính căn nhà của mình. 
"Không được bước qua ranh giới, 
Không được ăn uống chung, 
Không được dùng nhà vệ sinh, 
Không được bắt chuyện, 
Không được tạo ra tiếng ồn khi đóng/mở cửa..." 
Cho đến khi anh gặp được một người phụ nữ mà anh không nhớ rõ đã từng gặp qua ở đâu. 
"Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không? Sao anh không vứt quách nó cho rồi đi?" 
Liệu số phận của người đàn ông đang đứng giữa hai sự lựa chọn này rồi sẽ ra sao?

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染をえらべない！

altTitles.en: I Can't Choose a Childhood Friend!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu não consigo escolher uma amiga de infância!

altTitles.vi: Tôi không thể chọn người bạn thơ ấu!

description.en:
I fell in love with my childhood friend, but we ended up separated. Now, after 10 years, I'm finally reunited with her! However, just as I started looking forward to an amazing school life with her, I found out that she was... not alone...?
___
See also the related [Web Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/bc53a34e-2771-43f1-b967-9046f4d7b8f1/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) version.
description.ja:
大好きだったけど離れ離れになってしまった幼馴染。
そんな彼女と10年ぶりに再会した！
最高の学校生活が待っているかと思いきや、彼女は“一人じゃなく”て…？
description.vi: Tôi đã yêu người bạn thời thơ ấu của mình, nhưng chúng tôi đã phải xa cách nhau. Giờ đây, sau 10 năm, chúng tôi cuối cùng cũng được tái hợp! Tuy nhiên, ngay khi tôi bắt đầu mong đợi một cuộc sống học đường tuyệt vời, tôi phát hiện ra rằng... cô ấy không chỉ là duy nhất...?!!
description.pt-br: Eu me apaixonei por minha amiga de infância, mas acabamos nos separando. Agora, 10 anos depois, finalmente nos reencontramos! Mas, assim que comecei a me empolgar com minha nova vida escolar com ela, percebi que ela... não era a única...?

title.en: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom

altTitles.ja: 完璧すぎて可愛げがないと婚約破棄された聖女は隣国に売られる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaigeganai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

altTitles.en: The Saint Whose Engagement Was Broken When She Became Too Perfect Is Sold off to a Neighboring Kingdom

altTitles.th: เพราะสมบูรณ์แบบจนไม่น่ารัก สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์จึงถูกถอนหมั้นและขายไปอาณาจักรข้างเคียง

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki Sugite Kawaige ga nai to Konyaku Hakisareta Seijo wa Ringoku ni Urareru

description.en:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
description.ja: “聖女”を代々輩出する家系に生まれたフィリアは、幼少からのスパルタ教育により「歴代最高の聖女」と評される程の実力を身につけ、完璧に仕事をこなしていた。だが、あまりの隙のなさに「完璧すぎて可愛げがない」と腫れ物のように扱われ、婚約者の第二王子ユリウスからも婚約破棄をされてしまう――。さらに“聖女”が不在のため苦しむ隣国との取引でフィリアは、莫大な金を対価に売られることに。隣国での悲惨な扱いを覚悟するフィリアだったが、待っていたのは予想外の大歓迎で……!?
description.pt-br: A família de Philia vem produzindo santos por gerações. Não é nenhuma surpresa que ela seja conhecida como a maior santa de todos os tempos e esteja prestes a se casar com o segundo príncipe, Julius. O que ninguém espera é que Julius cancele o noivado, alegando que a perfeição de Philia a torna sem charme e antipática. Para piorar a situação, Philia é enviada para um país vizinho em troca de ouro e recursos, forçando-a a deixar sua terra natal! Apesar de se preparar para maus-tratos, Philia encontra uma recepção calorosa em sua nova cidade, onde ela faz bom uso de suas habilidades santas, erguendo barreiras contra monstros e curando epidemias. Mas enquanto ela floresce em sua nova vida, sua terra natal está sob ameaça de destruição!

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình
description.pt-br: Pobre irmãzinha que arma seu onii-chan

altTitles.ja: スクールバック

description.en:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
まだら模様のヨイ

description.en:
Yoi, a girl who has nowhere to go because she looks different from the people around her.
Who reached out to her...?
description.ja:
異端の私、居場所はどこ？

遺伝子操作により、人とは異なる見た目と能力を持つヨイ。行き場を失った異形の彼女に手を差し伸べたのは、同じく居場所のない者たちが集まるコミューンだった。この場所に、わずかな希望を見出すヨイ。しかし、不可知の企みが、彼女を襲う……！

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

description.en: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja: 2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！ ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

altTitles.ja: 継母の心得

description.en:
Yamazaki Misaki passed away due to illness, but when she awoke, she found that she had been reborn as a character in a manga she had read before her death — the abusive, wicked stepmother of the young protagonist.  

Only remembering this the day before her wedding, there was already no way to escape. Determined to treat her stepson well, upon meeting him, she found the boy extremely adorable! 

As she worked to raise the child well with her memories to aid her, the attitude of her cold husband began to change?!
description.ja: 病気でこの世を去ることになった山崎美咲。ところが目を覚ますと、生前読んでいたマンガの世界に転生していた。しかも、幼少期の主人公を虐待する悪辣な継母キャラとして……。前世の記憶を取り戻したのは結婚式の前日で、もはや逃げようもない。とにかく虐待しないようにしよう、と決意して対面した継子は――めちゃくちゃ可愛いんですけどー!!!　ついつい前世の知識を駆使して子育てに奮闘しているうちに、超絶冷たかった旦那様の態度も変わってきて……!?　義息子のためならチートにもなっちゃう！　愛とオタクの力で異世界の育児事情を変える、異色の子育てファンタジー、開幕！

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

description.en: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...
description.ja: 子供のころ、小太郎は地元のいじめっ子によって屈辱の日々を送っていた。レスリングの天才少年・アキラ、バスケの天才少年・カナエ、天才ゲーマー少年・シグレにあらゆる勝負で負け続けていたのだった高校生となった小太郎は、仕返しするべく３人と再会したのであったが…！？
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...
description.pt-br: Os valentões locais atormentaram Kotaro quando ele era jovem. Eles eram o lutador habilidoso Akari. Kanae, um prodígio do basquete, e Shigure, um prodígio dos videogames. Todos os dias, Kotaro competia contra esses três caras em seus respectivos esportes com a intenção de vencer. Infelizmente, ele não era páreo para eles. No último ano do ensino médio, Kotaro agora tem outra oportunidade de enfrentá-los e exigir sua retribuição…! Mas ele descobrirá um segredo que nunca teria esperado…

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール

altTitles.th: ดราก้อนบอล

description.da: Den fantastiske historie starter for længe siden, tusindvis af kilometer fra hovedstaden i et fjerntliggende, lille asiatisk rige, langt ude i skoven. Her bor Son-Goku, en løjerlig lille 14-årig meget stærk dreng med en praktisk abehale. Siden sin bedstefars død har han boet helt alene. Han kløver brænde med de bare næver, er nærmest usårlig og har mange bemærkelsesværdige evner.
description.de: Der kleine Einsiedler Son-Goku und das Stadtmädchen Bulma brechen gemeinsam zu einem großen Abenteuer auf: Sie wollen die sieben geheimnisvollen Dragon Balls finden, mit deren Hilfe jeder Wunsch in Erfüllung geht...
description.en:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**
description.fi:
Pieni mutta vahva Son Goku sekä kaupunkilaistyttö Bulma lyöttäytyvät yhteen suurta seikkailua varten. He metsästävät salaperäisiä lohikäärmekuulia, jotka voivat toteuttaa omistajansa suurimman toiveen...

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille. 

[Lisätieto: Toisen painoksen kirjasta on sensuroitu perheen pienimmille sopimattomia kohtauksia vuoden 2003 pedofiliasyytösten vuoksi.]
description.fr: Les Dragon Ball, boules de cristal magiques, offrent à celui qui les détient la possibilité de réaliser tous ses voeux. Bien sûr la quête que mène Sangoku et ses amis pour les réunir n'est pas sans obstacles: tournois et combats rythment chaque tome de cette série-culte pour les jeunes adolescents. Scénarios et dialogues assez simples centrés sur la confrontation entre les différents protagonistes. Les textes se résument parfois aux cris des combattants mais le succès de la série dépasse largement cela, pour en faire un véritable mythe auprès de la jeune génération.
description.id: Son Goku adalah seorang anak laki-laki yang luar biasa yang tinggal di dalam gunung. Suatu hari dia berjumpa dengan Bulma yang sedang dalam perjalanan mencari Dragon Ball. Akhirnya mereka bersama-sama menjadi tujuh buah Dragon Ball. Ternyata Dragon Ball ke enam ada di gunjung Frypan yang sedang terbakar...
description.lt:
Susipažinkite su tyros širdies beždžionuodegiu berniuku Sangoku, atvykėliu iš kito pasaulio. Jis nepaprastai stiprus, o dar nepaprastesni jo nuotykiai. Sutikęs padėti aikštingai šešiolikmetei mergaitei Bulmai Sangokas leidžiasi į neįtikėtiną kelionę ieškoti septynių drakono rutulių, kuriuos surinkus galingasis drakonas išpildys bet kokį norą. Bet tai įvyksta tik kartą per metus! Paskui rutuliai vėl išsibarsto, juos vėl reikia rinkti, kad noras būtų išpildytas. Keliaudamas narsusis Gokas suras pavidalą keičiančių draugų, mokysis pas galingiausią Rytų dvikovų meistrą, kausis pasaulio stipruolio turnyre, susirems su didžiausiais siaubūnais ir nuožmiausiais priešais. O kur dar žiaurioji Raudonojo kaspino armija ir mirtingai pavojinga Raumenų bokšto tvirtovė, kurioje tyko visas būrys nindzių, kiborgų ir dar bjauresnių tipų... Ar pavyks Sangokui rasti drakono rutulius ir likti nenugalėtam?

Komikso „Drakonų kovos“ veiksmas vyksta kiniškoje aplinkoje, bet nebūtinai Kinijoje. Tiksli vieta nežinoma. Pati istorija labai paprasta, bet kurdamas norėčiau ją papildyti vis naujomis detalėmis ir piešiniais. Taip galiu piešti ką tik noriu ir mėgautis jauduliu bei nežinomybe, ką piešiu toliau.
Akira Torajama, 1985
description.no: Den lille enstøingen Son-Goku møter tilfeldigvis den tøffe 16 år gamle storbyjenta Bulma. Hun er på jakt etter syv mystiske dragekuler - dragonballs. Sammen reiser de videre i jakten på de magiske kulene som kan oppfylle deres innerste ønsker.
description.pl:
Manga stworzona przez Akirę Toriyamę, luźno oparta na motywach zaczerpniętych z chińskiej powieści Wędrówka na zachód. Manga składa się z 42 tomów. 
Głównym bohaterem Dragon Balla jest chłopiec z ogonem imieniem Son Gokū, który wraz z nowo poznaną przyjaciółką Bulmą wyrusza w podróż w poszukiwaniu tajemniczych Smoczych Kul. Gdy zbierze się siedem kul, pojawia się smok – Shen Long (pol. Boski Smok), który spełni jedno życzenie. Mimo, iż od wielu lat nikt nie zdołał zebrać wszystkich kul, w dalszych losach udaje się to. Son Gokū już jako dziecko dysponuje potężną siłą (potrafi udźwignąć samochód), a z biegiem czasu staje coraz silniejszy, i wraz z przyjaciółmi broni losów Ziemi, a nawet wszechświata.
description.ru: Манга «Жемчуг дракона» во многом перекликается с произведением китайской классической литературы «Путешествие на Запад», авторство которого приписывают У Чэн-Эню. Имя главного героя манги, Сон Гоку,— это японское чтение имени Сунь У-кун, Царя Обезьян, главного героя «Путешествия на Запад». Можно провести параллели и между другими персонажами «Путешествия на Запад» и «Жемчуга дракона». Булма, задавшаяся целью найти семь волшебных жемчужин, имеет много общего с монахом Сюань-цзаном, который отправляется в путешествие в Индию за священными сутрами. Два других спутника Булмы, Улун и Ямча, это пародия на свиноподобного Чжу Ба-цзе и демона Ша-сэна. А Князь-Бык Гюмао — быкоголовый демон Нюмован, которого путешественники повстречали на своем пути. В «Жемчуге дракона» фигурируют не только персонажи, но и предметы из романа «Путешествие на Запад»: волшебное облако Цзиньдоуюнь, на котором можно летать по небу, посох Царя Обезьян жуйбан, меняющий длину по воле хозяина, и многое-многое другое. Некоторые имена и названия мы перевели на китайский лад, чтобы внести в повествование капельку экзотического колорита, присущего оригиналу, другие же оставили в японском прочтении. Это сделано потому что поклонники манги и снятого по ней аниме во всем мире уже давно знают и любят их героев именно под японскими именами. Мы надеемся, что такая смесь имен и названий не помешает восприятию манги, так как весь мир, созданный автором, и без того являет собой беспорядочное смешение всевозможных языков, культур и времен. А вот в переводе названия манги мы решили отклониться от общепринятого варианта ради сохранения авторской шутки. Дело в том, что Dragon Ball — это прежде всего сорт китайского зеленого чая, вручную скрученного в шарики. Кстати, улун и пуэр — тоже китайские сорта чая, а ямча — китайская разновидность чайной церемонии. Автор вовсю обыгрывал «чайное» название манги, так почему же нам не подыграть ему?
description.uk:
Кулі Дракона... Сім містичних сфер, здатні виконати одне заповітне бажання: від нескінченного запасу полуниці до вічної юності та влади над цілим світом!

У пошуках цих артефактів дівчинка Бульма знайомиться із Соном Ґокӯ – маленьким хлопчиком із мавпячим хвостиком. Він дещо дивакуватий, але доброзичливий, наївний і неймовірно сильний! Разом вони вирушать у подорож, сповнену пригод, ворогів, небезпеки та битв за долю цілого світу!
description.zh: 相传，有七颗龙珠散落在世界的各个角落，当它们被聚集到一起时神龙就会出现，能够实现你的任何一个愿望。这个一个美丽的的传说引出了小悟空和他的朋友们寻找龙珠的故事。
description.es-la:
Por fin! Edición nacional de DragonBall, uno de los mangas más reconocidos a nivel mundial, que originalmente fue publicado en el Shonen Jump de Shueisha entre 1984 y 1995. La historia de Son Goku, el guerrero que, junto a sus amigos, protege a la Tierra de los más diversos y poderosos enemigos desde que es un chico hasta que es un adulto. Una serie que arranca con aventura y prosigue con mucha acción, aunque también algo de comedia. Esta edición argentina es completamente fiel a la japonesa, respetando el sentido de lectura oriental e incluyendo varios extras y sección de aclaraciones de la traducción. Su periodicidad es mensual.

---
Goku, es un niño muy especial que ha tenido que valerse por sí mismo en medio de la naturaleza y sin contacto con otras personas. Un día conoció a Bulma, una chica que busca las siete Esferas del Dragón, estos son elementos mágicos que al ser reunidos invocan a un dios dragón llamado Shenlong, el cual concederá un único deseo, cualquiera que este sea. Goku se une a Bulma en la búsqueda de las esferas sin imaginar que hay otros seres muy peligrosos que también las desean.
description.pt-br:
Dragon Ball segue as aventuras de Son Goku desde sua infância até a idade adulta e como ele treina artes marciais e explora o mundo em busca das sete esferas místicas conhecidas como as esferas do dragão, que pode invocar um dragão que concede desejos quando reunidos. Ao longo de sua jornada, Goku faz vários amigos e batalhas com uma grande variedade de vilões, muitos dos quais também procuram as esferas do dragão para seus próprios desejos. Ao longo do caminho se tornar o guerreiro mais forte do universo.

---
Tudo começa com o pequeno rapaz, Son Goku, que mora sozinho numa montanha. Foi encontrado numa floresta pelo velho Son Gohan que o ensinou a arte do kung fu. Numa noite, Gohan foi morto por um monstro misterioso. Ágil e forte e sem maldade, Goku destaca das outras pessoas por ter um rabo de macaco. A história começa quando Goku conhece Bulma, uma rapariga que o convence a ajudá-la na procura das 7 Bolas do Dragão que, quando reunidas, podem realizar um desejo através da invocação ao Deus Dragão…

---
A obra-prima escrita e desenhada pelo mestre Akira Toriyama, está de volta ao Brasil! Son Goku é um pequeno órfão de coração puro, mas com uma tremenda força. Depois de viver tanto tempo isolado da civilização, ele recebe a inesperada visita de uma garota! Bulma lhe propõe uma parceria para buscar as sete Esferas do Dragão, que, quando reunidas, são capazes de realizar qualquer desejo! Perigos e adversários não faltarão no caminho dessa dupla inusitada, e os mais variados personagens marcarão presença nesta aventura cheia de humor! Não perca a chance de acompanhar Goku em sua jornada, na conquista de novos amigos e na superação de todos os desafios com sua personalidade cativante e incríveis habilidades! Prepare-se para esta viagem cheia de reviravoltas, que a aventura já vai começar!
description.zh-hk: 從前從前，在距離都市數千公里外的某座深山裡住著一名叫孫悟空的男子，他身上有一顆爺爺留給他的４星龍珠…這個異想天開的故事，就由此拉開了序幕…76P極致彩頁大方分享！完全版三大特點：1.全套封面都是鳥山明老師新畫！2.雜誌連載時彩稿原封不動，忠實呈現！3.裝訂豪華，並收錄未公開之插畫！

altTitles.ja: 姫様“拷問”の時間です

altTitles.zh: 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!
description.id:
Seorang Putri yang ditahan oleh pasukan Raja Iblis, disiapkan untuk menerima siksaan dari Raja Iblis tanpa henti!

description.ja: 国王軍と魔王軍が衝突を始め幾年月。王女にして国王軍第三騎士団“騎士団長”の姫は、魔王軍により囚われの身となっていた！　やがて、姫に待ち受けるのは斜め上の拷問の数々で――!?

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ja: 幽霊肯定派の女子校生・綾瀬桃と、同級生の怪奇現象オタク・オカルト君。互いに否定するUFOと怪異を信じさせるため、桃はUFOスポットの病院廃墟へ、オカルト君は心霊スポットのトンネルへ行くのだが…。運命の恋が始まる!?
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.uk:
Чорти, чудовиська, позаземці, підлітковий роман, махачі та дідько б їх узяв… раковини! У цій манзі ви знайдете все!

Окультний фанбой Такакура, його подруга Аясе та їх надприродні пригоди у новій психоломній манзі!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

altTitles.ja: 屋根裏部屋の公爵夫人

description.en: The new life of Duchess Opal all started from a dusty attic. The house she resided in after a political marriage with the young Duke, Hubert, was full of hostility. There was also a woman named "Angel," who is treasured by the mansion's owner... Opal gained a bad reputation because of a disgraceful rumor and as a result, she was treated like a hindrance. However, the Duchess doesn't like losing, so it won't end like this! The woman is unrelated to the management of the territory. I will outwit those who let their guard down…!
description.ja: 若き公爵、ヒューバートとの政略結婚で住むことになった邸は敵意に満ち、そして邸の者に大切にされている『天使』と呼ばれる女性がいた…いわれのない不名誉な噂のせいで悪評の的にされ、邪魔者扱いされるオパールだったが、負けず嫌いな公爵夫人はこのままじゃ終わらない！女は領地経営と無縁。そう油断する者たちを出し抜いていく……！！オパールの未来は明るいものになるのか―

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.ja: はんなりギロリの頼子さん

description.en: The manga follows Shindou Yoriko, a 29-year-old Kyoto cigarette shop owner who has a sharp look in her eyes but is actually a kind-hearted person. It may not come across, but she truly loves the city of Kyoto, and is willing to give up some of her time to share that love with tourists and other visitors (as long as they don't get on her nerves).
description.pt-br: Shindou Yoriko, um dono de uma loja de cigarros Kyoto de 29 anos que tem um olhar penetrante, mas na verdade é uma pessoa de bom coração. Pode não parecer, mas ela realmente ama a cidade de Kyoto e está disposta a abrir mão de parte de seu tempo para compartilhar esse amor com turistas e outros visitantes (desde que não a irritem).

title.en: After Losing My Job, I Met Miss Mermaid at the Beach

altTitles.zh: 失业后我在海边遇见了人鱼小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Shiye hou Wo zai Haibian Yujian le Renyu-xiaojie

description.en: After a failed romance and losing her job, the female protagonist decides to join a tour group for a seaside getaway to relax. Unexpectedly, she encounters a mermaid in the ocean! The mermaid engages in some strange behavior and suddenly disappears. The next day, when the female protagonist sees the mermaid again, she is left completely astonished.

title.en: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong

altTitles.zh: 为了复活暗恋的师尊我被迫开了后宫

altTitles.zh-ro: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng

altTitles.en: I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on

description.zh: 花樱樱一朝穿成小孤女，命悬一线之时，天降仙女师尊，救她于水火。 于是花樱樱日日撩夜夜追，终于舔化冰山，只等师尊渡劫成功就能双宿双修，双宿双飞…… 谁成想师尊居然渡劫失败，碎成了渣渣！ 为了复活师尊，花樱樱穿梭七重镜界，要和七个不同身份的切片师尊酱酱酿酿，水乳交融！ 花樱樱捏拳，无奈道：开后宫什么的，都是为了拯救师尊呐！

title.en: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.ja: 与えられたスキルを使って稼いで異世界美女達とイチャイチャしたい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other Worlds

altTitles.pt-br: Quero usar as habilidade que me foi dado para ganhar dinheiro e flertar com lindas mulheres de outro mundo.

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.
description.pt-br: Naquele dia, Ishida Yamada estava trabalhando meio período, como sempre. Ao abrir a porta dos fundos após terminar seu trabalho de meio período, ele encontrou um espaço em branco e uma pessoa que se autodenominava Deus. Foi por acaso que ele foi escolhido por Deus para ir para outro mundo. Ele ficou perplexo, mas decidiu viver mesmo assim. Pensando em como sobreviver neste outro mundo usando as habilidades que recebeu de Deus, ele tenta ao máximo ter um relacionamento físico com uma linda mulher neste outro mundo.

title.en: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchi-chuu!

altTitles.ja: おひとり様には慣れましたので。婚約者放置中！

altTitles.ja-ro: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchichuu!

altTitles.en: Since I've Gotten Used to Being Alone, I'm Ignoring My Fiancé!

altTitles.zh-hk: 已經習慣一個人了。訂婚對象放置中！

altTitles.zh: 已经习惯一个人了。订婚对象放置中！

description.en: Countess Nicole's fiance, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

altTitles.ja: ノイパちゃんはアブナイ!

description.en: At school, no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact, they don't even seem to notice her existence, except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.
description.ja:
ねぇ、アタシのこと…見てた?

男子学生"ユウ"の前に現れた、露出全開な美少女"ノイパ"。彼女は大胆な衣装に身を包んでいるにも関わらず、日常に溶け込み、他の教師や生徒は無反応。
description.es-la: En la escuela, a nadie parece importarle la vestimenta de Noipa-chan, una estudiante transferida. De hecho, ni siquiera parecen notar su existencia, salvo por una persona. Yuu es el único que se pregunta qué sucede con esa chica, y ahora que fue descubierto mirándola, se verá inmiscuido en una situación de peligro.
description.pt-br: Na escola, ninguém parece se importar com o que a estudante transferida Noipa-chan usa. Na verdade, eles nem parecem notar a sua existência, exceto uma pessoa. Yuu é o único que se pergunta o que está acontecendo com aquela garota.

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

altTitles.vi: Chấm dứt tình yêu này đi được không?

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
description.vi:
Hachikawa Yuzu, một nữ sinh cấp 3 với cuộc đời học đường ảm đạm có một bí mật. Rằng thực chất cô ấy là một người hâm mộ cuồng nhiệt của Hayami Madoka, bạn cùng lớp và cũng là một nữ diễn viên nổi tiếng.
Yuzu, ngưỡng mộ và tôn sùng Madoka như một nữ thần, cảm thấy hạnh phúc khi chỉ đơn giản được học cùng lớp và nhìn ngắm Madoka mỗi ngày.
Lẽ ra chỉ như thế đã đủ, nhưng cho tới một ngày...
Một câu chuyện tình yêu méo mó nhưng đồng thời cũng vô cùng thuần khiết.

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsiedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

altTitles.ja: ドッペルさん

description.en: Unsociable girl vs. shady boy + doppelganger-san! Yamamoto and Hattori. The two can't start a romantic comedy on their own, but... Hattori's doppelganger, "Doppel-san," will tell him what she's really thinking! Is Doppel-san the cupid of love? Or is she just a figment of his imagination?
description.pt-br: Uma garota insociável x garoto sombrio + doppelgänger-san! Yamamoto e Hattori. Os dois não podem começar uma comédia romântica por conta própria, mas… O doppelganger de Hattori, “Doppel-san”, lhe dirá o que ela realmente está pensando! Doppel-san é o cupido do amor? Ou ele é apenas mais uma presença sinistra?

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en: An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!
description.ja: 普通の高校生・小滝夢路のクラスに転校してきたのは、身長が8メートルに巨大化した幼馴染・大峰ちえりだった！ちえりの学校生活のサポートをする「お手伝いさん」を任された夢路。身長差がある二人の日常はドキドキがいっぱいで!?　高低差もなんのその！
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity IV: The Forbidden Advent Garden, Salem - Heretical Salem

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅳ 禁忌降臨庭園 セイレム 異端なるセイレム

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten IV: Kinki Kourin Teien, Salem - Itan naru Salem

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность IV: Запретный сад Адвента, Салем-Салем Ереси

altTitles.vi: Dị Điểm Á Chủng IV - Khu Vườn Giáng Lâm Cấm Kỵ Salem - Salem Dị Giáo

description.en: As a result of the efforts of the people of Chaldea, the human incineration plan of those who called themselves the Magic King was bitterly stopped at the water's edge, and the destiny of the world seemed to be breathing again. However, suddenly, the singularity of the same level as the singularity so far is observed in modern times. A master who has opened up the future once again puts himself into a layershift to calm down the "subspecies singularities" that appeared in the cursed land "Salem."
description.ru: Халдея во главе с Рицука Фуджимару, мастером, проникшим на проклятую землю «Салем», чтобы ответить на новую «особенность». "Я встретила двух девушек Эбигейл и Лавинию".

altTitles.ja: スマザー・ミー

description.en: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
description.vi: Detroit là thành phố nơi người lớn thống trị mọi thứ. Akio bị bán, trở thành sát thủ với tên gọi là Rắn. Cuộc sống hàng ngày của cậu chỉ là tuân theo mệnh lệnh. Một ngày, cậu gặp một cô gái mù và dần dần tìm ra ý nghĩa mới của cuộc sống...

altTitles.ja: GTO パラダイス・ロスト

description.en:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison!

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison.

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*Due to a change in publishers this series ended at chapter 178.5 and continued on as "GTO: Paradise Lost Kai" (listed under the "Related" tab), picking up where the story left off.
description.pt-br:
A próxima etapa para o Grande Professor Onizuka Eikichi é... uma prisão!

Preso devido a um incidente causado em sua turma, da qual ele foi nomeado professor assistente há apenas seis meses! Uma recém-criada classe de artes performáticas na Escola Secundária Kissho Academy, feita para alunos que trabalham em diversas indústrias de mídia! Onizuka, que diz não ter nenhum arrependimento, começa a contar tranquilamente a verdade sobre o incidente na prisão.

Finalmente, a história de décadas de Eikichi Onizuka chega a uma conclusão dramática!

Devido a uma mudança de editora, essa série terminou no capítulo 178.5 e continuou como "GTO: Paradise Lost Kai" (listado na aba "Relacionado"), retomando de onde a história parou.

altTitles.ja: 灼熱カバディ

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

altTitles.en: Creepy Cat ~ My Strange Daily Life with a Cat ~

altTitles.ja: CreepyCat 猫と私の奇妙な生活

altTitles.ms: Kucing Seram - Kehidupan seharian yang pelik bersama kucing.

altTitles.uk: Моторошний кіт - Моє дивне життя з котиком

altTitles.ro: Pisica Ciudată - Viața Mea Zilnică cu o Pisică Ciudată

altTitles.ur: ترسناک بلی ~ بساتھ ایک بلی میری عجیب زندگیِ روزمرہ ~

description.en:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.
description.ur: فلورا ابھی ایک پرانے گھر میں منتقل ہوئی ہے، لیکن وہاں پہلے ہی ایک ترسناک بلی رہ رہی ہے۔ تب سے ان کی پراسرار ہم آہنگی کا آغاز ہوا۔

title.en: The Senpai Who Only Hits on Me with Her Bangs On...

altTitles.ja: 前髪ある時だけグイグイ来る先輩…

altTitles.ja-ro: Maegami Aru Toki Dake Guigui Kuru Senpai…

altTitles.ja: メイドいんジャパン

description.en: In order to be bought by a rich family, Narumi Inoue, hiding the truth that he is a man, goes to a girls' school. As a trainee, Narumi was sent to serve a girl from a rich family who hates maids (only weekends). Keeping the 'heart of treating/serving people,' Japanese maid, Maid in Japan, Narumi's battle will start? If it is found out that Narumi is a man, he will be castrated.

title.en: Jishou F-Rank no Oniisama ga Game de Hyouka sareru Gakuen no Chouten ni Kunrin suru Sou desu yo?

altTitles.en: Dear Self-styled F-Rank Bro' Says, He's gonna Rule a Game-Oriented School.
My Dear Self-Proclaimed F-rank Brother might Rule this School where your Worth is Determined by Games

altTitles.ru: Брат фальшивого F-ранга собирается править в академии с геймерской оценкой потенциала.

altTitles.ja: 自称Ｆランクのお兄さまがゲームで評価される学園の頂点に君臨するそうですよ？

description.en: Shishio Academy is a prestigious, the best school in Japan, in which only the elite of such fields as study, sports, pedigree can study. But in reality it is a school of principles of “devouring the weak by the strong”, where everything is measured by the results of the games. This is a massacre in which only a definite winner can survive. Guren is a legend of the shadow world, conquering and invincible, and at the same time he wants to start a normal, carefree life. He fails the entrance exams to the academy on purpose, therefore, following his results, he qualifies as the lowest grade F. However, after reuniting with his younger sister Karen, the situation changes dramatically. And when his sister is in danger, he shows his true abilities!
description.ru:
Академия Шишио - престижная, лучшая в Японии школа, учиться в которой может лишь элита таких сфер, как учеба, спорт, родословная. Но в действительности это школа принципов "пожирания слабых сильными", где всё оценивается результатами игр. Это бойня, в которой может выжить лишь несомненный победитель.   
Главный герой Сайджо Гурен - легенда теневого мира, побеждающий и непобедимый, и вместе с тем он желает начать обычную, беззаботную жизнь. Вступительные экзамены в академию он проваливает нарочно, поэтому по его итогам квалифицируется как самый низкий ранг F. Однако, после воссоединения с кровной младшей сестрой Сайджо Карен, ситуация резко меняется. И когда сестру поджидают опасности, он проявляет истинные способности!   


---

title.en: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活～二度目の人生はやりたい放題したいだけなのに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活

altTitles.en: The Misunderstood Saintly Life of a Villainous Scion ~ I just want to do whatever I want in my second life~

description.en:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!
description.ja:
悪徳領主として名高いヴェレット家の長男―オウガ・ヴェレットは転生者である。人の良さから前世で割を食ってばかりだった彼は、これを機にやりたい放題の悪役御曹司ライフを謳歌するため横暴の限りを尽くすはずが―


「さすがです！　オウガ様！」

……『傍若無人な振る舞い』をしてるだけなのに、なぜか周囲からの評価が瞬く間に上がっていき――⁉悪役御曹司の勘違いの勘違い聖者生活、開幕！

title.en: Rettoujin no Maken Tsukai: Skill Board wo Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Rettoujin no Maken Tsukai: Sukiruboudo o Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru
Rettou Hito no Maken Tsukai: Sukiruboudo wo Kushi Shite Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja: 劣等人の魔剣使い　スキルボードを駆使して最強に至る

altTitles.en: Inferior Magic Swordsman: Using the Skill Board to Become the Strongest
Using the Skill Board as an Inferior Magic Swordsman to Become the Strongest
Use the Skill Board to Become the Most Powerful Swordsman

altTitles.th: การใช้สกิลบอร์ด เพื่อเข้าถึงการเป็นผู้ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดของนักดาบเวทมนตร์ผู้ต่ำต้อย

altTitles.zh: 劣等人魔剑使运用技能板成为最强

altTitles.zh-hk: 劣等人魔劍使　運用技能板成為最強

altTitles.tr: Reenkarnasyon Geçirmiş Alt Tabaka Büyülü Kılıç Ustası

description.en: A normal office worker, Toru Minasuki, was swallowed up by a dimensional fissure and reincarnated into a different world. Upon reincarnation, Toru was given a [skill board] by God. Make the most of it to acquire all the necessary skills! Even though he is an "inferior person," he'll make his way to the top!
description.it: Un normale impiegato, Toru Minasuki, è stato inghiottito da una fessura dimensionale e si è reincarnato in un altro mondo. Dopo la reincarnazione, a Toru viene donata una [skillboard] da Dio. Ne approfitterà per acquisire tutte le abilità necessarie a sopravvivere in questo mondo! Nonostante sia una "lost person".
description.ru: Обычный офисный работник, Тору Мизунори, был поглощен огромной расщелиной и был перерожден в другом мире. После перерождения Бог дал Тору "список навыков". Сделай все возможное, что бы приобрести все нужные навыки! Несмотря на то, что он "слабейший человек", он пробьется к вершине.
description.th: มิซึโนริ โทรุ คนทำงานสำนักงานทั่วไป ถูกกลืนหายไปกับรอยแยกมิติ แล้วมาเกิดใหม่ที่ต่างโลก เมื่อมาเกิดใหม่ โทรุ ได้รับ [สกิลบอร์ด] โดยพระเจ้า ใช้ประโยชน์จากมันให้ได้มากที่สุด เพื่อรับสกิลที่จำเป็นทั้งหมด! แม้ว่าเขาจะเป็น "คนต่ำต้อย" เขาก็จะก้าวไปสู่จุดสูงสุด!
description.tr: Normal bir ofis çalışanı olan Toru Minasuki, boyutsal bir yarık tarafından yutuldu ve farklı bir dünyaya reenkarne oldu. Reenkarnasyonun ardından Toru'ya Tanrı tarafından bir [beceri tablosu] verildi. Gerekli tüm becerileri edinmek için bundan en iyi şekilde yararlanın! "Aşağılık bir insan" olmasına rağmen, zirveye doğru yol alacaktır!
description.pt-br: Um trabalhador assalariado normal, Toru Minasuki, foi engolido por uma fenda dimensional e reencarnou em um mundo cheio de vermes e monstros. Após a reencarnação, Toru recebeu um [Quadro de Habilidades] por uma deusa. Aproveite ao máximo para adquirir todas as habilidades necessárias! Mesmo sendo uma "pessoa inferior", ele chegará ao topo?

title.en: Sekai wo Teki ni Mawashitemo Neko wo Aishiteru

altTitles.ja: 世界を敵に回してもねこを愛してる

altTitles.en: I'll Always Love Cats, Even if it Turns the World Against Me

description.en: A comic essay about the author's love for cats and her daily life with her 3 cats.

Kang Yesol, who was transferred to the region of his alma mater, meets Jeong Hanlim, the owner of a bar named Splitter.

Yesol, who had been drinking heavily at the bar, wakes up the next morning at Hanlim's house and runs away in shock upon realizing that he slept with a man.

After realizing he lost an important USB drive, Yesol had no choice but to return to Hanlim. There, he suddenly recognizes that Hanlim is a junior from the baseball team.

Yesol, who has completely forgotten his high school memories, does not think much of Hanlim, who is hostile toward him, but he gradually begins to recall the past that he had once forgotten.

"Sunbae, People like you should just die."

title.en: It's Not My Fault for Being Delicious

altTitles.zh-ro: Meiwei you bushi wo de cuo

description.en: Bai Qian Qian, a human, fell into the demon world and became an ingredient! Now the handsome looking demons want to eat her!!! QAQ In order to survive, she signed a contract with the bamboo demon Xia Zhu and became his main ingredient... Wait, something's not right. Shit, is this what love feels like?
description.zh: 漫画简介: 人类少女白茜茜，误入妖界秒变食材！妖怪都是帅哥，各个都想吃掉她QAQ?为生存她与竹妖夏竹缔结契约，成为他的专属食材……等等，似乎有什么不对？糟糕，好像是心动的感觉！

title.en: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitakunaru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.

altTitles.ja: 本物のカノジョにしたくなるまで、私で試していいよ。

altTitles.ja-ro: Honmono no Kanojo ni Shitaku Naru Made, Watashi de Tameshite Ii yo.

altTitles.en: Try Me Until You Choose Me as Your Real Girlfriend

description.en:
In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dream—a perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world.

Aoishi thought he’d follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception.

As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives? The most dangerous part of their youth is just about to begin!

Adapted from a popular light novel, now in manga form!

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather

description.en: After getting rejected by her fiancé, 20-year-old Mary Menoushire passed out from the shock. She then got possessed by a 50-year-old lady from another world... who thinks her (ex) fiancé's grandfather is hotter.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...
